alert.note: Alert for Guaynabo; San Juan (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 7:23PM ADT until August 22 at 8:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR GUAYNABO AND SAN JUAN COUNTIES... At 623 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated showers producing light to moderate rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to a quarter of an inch are possible in the warned area. Emergency managers and 911 have reported flash flooding from small streams across the warned area, with stranded cars and flood waters affecting various residences and other structures. So far, no rescues have been reported. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar, Emergency Managers, and 911. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
